body:
Addressed Deprecation warnings on publishing of new patches.
Verification of package updates and expansion of testing environments. 
Reorganized in-app directories by adding directory and moved others inside.
Specifically updated linting. Stricter linting implemented. 
Focusing on more permanently fixing templates, begun work on visual tests. 
Introduced a visual testing via playwright and more for Jules.

name: v1.4.2

body:
Implemented tutoring side documentation under /teaching. 
 Significant expansion of the tutoring protocol for creating new materials.

name: v1.4.1

body:
Small tweaks. Complete shift to public repository. 
Adjustements to the publish process and the upload process complete. 
Heavily expanded documentation.
name: v1.4.0

body:
Heavily refactored the whole app structure, focusing on normalization of the html for lessons, lessonsAN, excercises and content under 'other'. 
Multiple visual improvements, including new buttons and a new header. 
The app now uses a more modular approach, with content being loaded dynamically based on the current tab. 
This should make future updates and maintenance much easier. 
Also, the app now has a more consistent look and feel across different sections. 
And a few functions have been further refined, such as the reset button and the content loader.
name: v1.3.9

body:
Implemented visual feedback area for the reset button, for loading and for saving. 
Improved reloading on reset to reload SAME excercise block.
name: v1.3.8

body: Implemented 'Return to N1' button for exercises, fixed save naming convention, implemented displaying active saves in settings and separating saves-state folder from saves folder.
name: v1.3.7

body:
Simplified patch notes system. 
The application now generates patch notes directly from this file, which must be manually updated before each release.
